statements: SELECT * FROM email_scheduler;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM email_scheduler WHERE event_trigger = 'new_user';
SELECT customer_id, event_timestamp, scheduled_timestamp FROM email_scheduler ORDER BY scheduled_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM email_scheduler WHERE event_trigger = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, event_trigger, scheduled_timestamp FROM email_scheduler LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM email_scheduler WHERE event_trigger = 'registration' ORDER BY scheduled_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM email_scheduler WHERE event_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails, event_trigger FROM email_scheduler GROUP BY event_trigger HAVING count(*) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, event_trigger FROM email_scheduler WHERE scheduled_timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT DISTINCT event_trigger FROM email_scheduler ORDER BY event_trigger ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_triggers;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition, customer_id FROM customer_behavior_triggers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM email_scheduling WHERE email_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_subject FROM email_scheduling ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_subject, email_body FROM email_scheduling WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_triggers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM email_scheduling WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT trigger_name FROM customer_behavior_triggers WHERE trigger_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM email_scheduling WHERE email_id > 100 AND email_id < 200;
SELECT customer_id, trigger_condition FROM customer_behavior_triggers ORDER BY trigger_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT trigger_name, event_timestamp FROM email_triggers ORDER BY behavior_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_name, event_timestamp FROM behaviors WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT behavior_name, event_timestamp FROM behaviors WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, behavior_name FROM email_triggers JOIN behaviors ON email_triggers.behavior_id = behaviors.behavior_id;

SELECT customer_name, email, trigger_name FROM customers JOIN behaviors ON customers.customer_id = behaviors.customer_id JOIN email_triggers ON behaviors.behavior_id = email_triggers.behavior_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email_address FROM customers WHERE behavior_trigger = 'SPAM';
SELECT email_id, subject, scheduled_time FROM emails ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, description FROM triggers WHERE trigger_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, customer_id, log_time FROM email_logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email_address FROM customers WHERE behavior_trigger = 'purchase';
SELECT email_id, subject, scheduled_time FROM emails ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT customers.name, emails.subject FROM customers JOIN email_logs ON customers.customer_id = email_logs.customer_id JOIN emails ON email_logs.email_id = emails.email_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, template_id, scheduled_time FROM scheduled_emails WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_description FROM behavior_triggers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, template_name, scheduled_time FROM scheduled_emails JOIN email_templates ON scheduled_emails.template_id = email_templates.template_id WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, template_subject, template_body FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM scheduled_emails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_emails > 3;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, timestamp FROM campaign_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
